issue.title: [Archery][CI] Refactor EmailReport to be a JinjaReport and move Report to be a utility class
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16448](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16448). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This ticket is a follow up from the conversation on <https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13031#discussion_r863698975>

We should move the EmailReport to be a JinjaReport and the current archery.crossbow.reports.Report class to be a utility class to be used on the EmailReport and ChatReport to retrieve the information from the Repo. We also should add tests to the EmailReport similar to the ones added to ChatReport.
